name: Twitch Live Stats Tool  2014 (v2.0)
short_description:
Hello,
this is Twitch Live Stat Tool 2014 v2.0 - By Pooria Sharaffodin
Website: http://www.twitch.tv/

Features:
    - Live Viewers Count
    - Live Followers Count
    - Live Views Count
	- Live New Sub (Subscriber) Information
	- Live Website View
    - Live Chat + with Custom Function, Color..
    - On Top Mod On/Off
    - Automatically Refresh Software, Not the whole Website (Very Sick! & CPU Friendly)  
    - FREE FOR ALL
	
How to use:
1. Put your URL in the Box, click "Start Live Stats"
That's all! Have Fun ;-)

Please let me know if this software is cool and you enjoy it.
You can send me also new function wishes or something.

Make sure to visit our Site, Blog and FB - Good Luck and Have Fun
http://sharaffodin.blogspot.de/
https://www.facebook.com/Sharaffodin
summary: Twitch Live Stat Tool Followers, Viwers, Views, Subscriber..
